verses.verse: לְדָוִ֨ד ׀ <S%H1732><s%> [A Psalm] of David יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אוֹרִ֣י <S%H216><s%> [is] my light וְ֭יִשְׁעִי <S%H3468><s%> and my salvation מִמִּ֣י <S%H4310><s%> Whom אִירָ֑א <S%H3372><s%> whom shall I fear יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> ? the LORD מָֽעוֹז־ <S%H4581><s%> [is] the strength חַ֝יַּ֗י <S%H2416><s%> of my life מִמִּ֥י <S%H4310><s%> Whom אֶפְחָֽד׃ <S%H6342><s%> of whom shall I be afraid

בִּקְרֹ֤ב <S%H7126><s%> came עָלַ֨י ׀ <S%H5921><s%> When מְרֵעִים֮ <S%H7489><s%> When the wicked לֶאֱכֹ֪ל <S%H398><s%> upon me to eat up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּשָׂ֫רִ֥י <S%H1320><s%> my flesh צָרַ֣י <S%H6862><s%> [even] mine enemies וְאֹיְבַ֣י <S%H341><s%> and my foes לִ֑י הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they כָשְׁל֣וּ <S%H3782><s%> they stumbled וְנָפָֽלוּ׃ <S%H5307><s%> and fell

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Though תַּחֲנֶ֬ה <S%H2583><s%> should encamp עָלַ֨י ׀ <S%H5921><s%> against מַחֲנֶה֮ <S%H4264><s%> Though an host לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not יִירָ֪א <S%H3372><s%> shall not fear לִ֫בִּ֥י <S%H3820><s%> against me my heart אִם־ <S%H518><s%> Though תָּק֣וּם <S%H6965><s%> should rise עָ֭לַי <S%H5921><s%> against מִלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> though war בְּ֝זֹ֗את <S%H2063><s%> likewise אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I בוֹטֵֽחַ׃ <S%H982><s%> against me in this [will] I [be] confident

אַחַ֤ת ׀ <S%H259><s%> One שָׁאַ֣לְתִּי <S%H7592><s%> [thing] have I desired מֵֽאֵת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אוֹתָ֪הּ <S%H853><s%> אֲבַ֫קֵּ֥שׁ <S%H1245><s%> that will I seek שִׁבְתִּ֣י <S%H3427><s%> after that I may dwell בְּבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> in the house יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> all the days חַיַּ֑י <S%H2416><s%> of my life לַחֲז֥וֹת <S%H2372><s%> to behold בְּנֹֽעַם־ <S%H5278><s%> the beauty יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וּלְבַקֵּ֥ר <S%H1239><s%> and to enquire בְּהֵיכָלֽוֹ׃ <S%H1964><s%> in his temple

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for יִצְפְּנֵ֨נִי ׀ <S%H6845><s%> he shall hide בְּסֻכֹּה֮ <S%H5520><s%> me in his pavilion בְּי֪וֹם <S%H3117><s%> For in the time רָ֫עָ֥ה <S%H7451><s%> of trouble יַ֭סְתִּרֵנִי <S%H5641><s%> shall he hide בְּסֵ֣תֶר <S%H5643><s%> in the secret אָהֳל֑וֹ <S%H168><s%> of his tabernacle בְּ֝צ֗וּר <S%H6697><s%> upon a rock יְרוֹמְמֵֽנִי׃ <S%H7311><s%> me he shall set me up

וְעַתָּ֨ה <S%H6258><s%> and now יָר֪וּם <S%H7311><s%> be lifted up רֹאשִׁ֡י <S%H7218><s%> And now shall mine head עַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> above אֹֽיְבַ֬י <S%H341><s%> above mine enemies סְֽבִיבוֹתַ֗י <S%H5439><s%> round about וְאֶזְבְּחָ֣ה <S%H2076><s%> me therefore will I offer בְ֭אָהֳלוֹ <S%H168><s%> in his tabernacle זִבְחֵ֣י <S%H2077><s%> sacrifices תְרוּעָ֑ה <S%H8643><s%> of joy אָשִׁ֥ירָה <S%H7891><s%> I will sing וַ֝אֲזַמְּרָ֗ה <S%H2167><s%> yea I will sing praises לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

שְׁמַע־ <S%H8085><s%> Hear יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD קוֹלִ֥י <S%H6963><s%> with my voice אֶקְרָ֗א <S%H7121><s%> [when] I cry וְחָנֵּ֥נִי <S%H2603><s%> have mercy וַעֲנֵֽנִי׃ <S%H6030><s%> also upon me and answer

לְךָ֤ ׀ אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> said לִ֭בִּי <S%H3820><s%> my heart בַּקְּשׁ֣וּ <S%H1245><s%> [When thou saidst] Seek פָנָ֑י <S%H6440><s%> ye my face אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פָּנֶ֖יךָ <S%H6440><s%> unto thee Thy face יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> LORD אֲבַקֵּֽשׁ׃ <S%H1245><s%> will I seek

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nor תַּסְתֵּ֬ר <S%H5641><s%> Hide פָּנֶ֨יךָ ׀ <S%H6440><s%> not thy face מִמֶּנִּי֮ <S%H4480><s%> at אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> nor תַּט־ <S%H5186><s%> away בְּאַ֗ף <S%H639><s%> in anger עַ֫בְדֶּ֥ךָ <S%H5650><s%> not thy servant עֶזְרָתִ֥י <S%H5833><s%> thou hast been my help הָיִ֑יתָ <S%H1961><s%> have been אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> nor תִּטְּשֵׁ֥נִי <S%H5203><s%> leave וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> nor תַּֽ֝עַזְבֵ֗נִי <S%H5800><s%> me not neither forsake אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> me O God יִשְׁעִֽי׃ <S%H3468><s%> of my salvation

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> For אָבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> When my father וְאִמִּ֣י <S%H517><s%> and my mother עֲזָב֑וּנִי <S%H5800><s%> forsake וַֽיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> me then the LORD יַֽאַסְפֵֽנִי׃ <S%H622><s%> will take me up

ה֤וֹרֵ֥נִי <S%H3384><s%> Teach יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD דַּ֫רְכֶּ֥ךָ <S%H1870><s%> me thy way וּ֭נְחֵנִי <S%H5148><s%> and lead בְּאֹ֣רַח <S%H734><s%> path מִישׁ֑וֹר <S%H4334><s%> me in a plain לְ֝מַ֗עַן <S%H4616><s%> Because שׁוֹרְרָֽי׃ <S%H8324><s%> because of mine enemies

אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּ֭תְּנֵנִי <S%H5414><s%> Deliver בְּנֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> me not over unto the will צָרָ֑י <S%H6862><s%> of mine enemies כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for קָֽמוּ־ <S%H6965><s%> are risen up בִ֥י עֵֽדֵי־ <S%H5707><s%> witnesses שֶׁ֝֗קֶר <S%H8267><s%> for false וִיפֵ֥חַ <S%H3307><s%> against me and such as breathe out חָמָֽס׃ <S%H2555><s%> cruelty

לׅׄוּלֵׅ֗ׄאׅׄ <S%H3884><s%> [I had fainted] unless הֶ֭אֱמַנְתִּי <S%H539><s%> I had believed לִרְא֥וֹת <S%H7200><s%> to see בְּֽטוּב־ <S%H2898><s%> the goodness יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land חַיִּֽים׃ <S%H2416><s%> of the living

קַוֵּ֗ה <S%H6960><s%> Wait אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> for יְה֫וָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> on the LORD חֲ֭זַק <S%H2388><s%> be of good courage וְיַאֲמֵ֣ץ <S%H553><s%> and he shall strengthen לִבֶּ֑ךָ <S%H3820><s%> thine heart וְ֝קַוֵּ֗ה <S%H6960><s%> wait אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> for יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> I say on the LORD
